name: Entwined Demo
description:
This is the demo Entwined, a Sokoban-like game in which you maneuver two circles into hoops at the same time. Watch out for many variations and fun challenges!

The game has been in progress for four months, and I will be expanding it further, but I wanted to get a feel for how people would respond to the puzzles and design. Please let me know any thoughts that you have on the project! You can reach me at Instagram: @crouton_party or email: croutonpartygames@gmail.com.
